title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 127.4 - Compensation of attorneys for children
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 127.4 - Compensation of attorneys for children

State Regulations

Claims by attorneys for children for
compensation, expenses and disbursements pursuant to section
245
of the

Family Court Act and section
35
of the

Judiciary Law shall be determined pursuant to the rules of the appropriate

Appellate Division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
127.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
